actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to amend the Clean Air Act to assure compliance with mobile source emission standards.
short_title: Mobile Source Emission Control Protection Act

summary.text: Mobile Source Emission Control Protection Act - Amends the Clean Air Act to prohibit any person from: (1) offering for sale any device for the purpose of rendering inoperative any device or element of design installed on or in a motor vehicle or motor vehicle engine in compliance with regulations under such Act following its sale and delivery to the ultimate purchaser; or (2) from manufacturing any device capable of being used for such purpose which is being offered for sale for such purpose within the privity and knowledge of such person.

titles.title: Mobile Source Emission Control Protection Act
A bill to amend the Clean Air Act to assure compliance with mobile source emission standards.
